title: Long Eaton BJJ Website
summary: Built and launched the public website for Long Eaton BJJ with clear navigation for timetable, pricing, instructors, kids classes, gallery, and contact.
problem: The gym needed a clearer digital presence so new students and parents could quickly understand the offer and book a free trial.
approach: Built a mobile-first site structure with direct CTAs, concise page sections, and route-level navigation for each core info area.
outcome: The club now has a live production site with clear trial and contact pathways, social links, and a dedicated gallery experience.
metrics: Sticky mobile action bar includes direct Book Trial and Call buttons.
Contact surfaces include click-to-call plus WhatsApp, Instagram, and Facebook links.

testimonial.quote: The new website has been fantastic for our club. It's easy to navigate, looks great on mobile, and has definitely helped us attract new students. The clear CTAs and dedicated gallery have made a big difference in how we present ourselves online.
testimonial.author: Mikey Dean, Head Coach at Long Eaton BJJ
